# Build powerful live experiences in your product
Create immersive live experiences with everything you need - audio/video conferencing, live streaming, and chat - all packed into a single SDK.
[Start building](https://dyte.io/<https:/dev.dyte.io/signup>)[Talk to an expert](https://dyte.io/</contact>)
99.99% call success rate
SOC2 and GDPR compliant
TRUSTED ACROSS TEAMS
Maximize your budget by creating the tools you need at a fraction of the cost of traditional development.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b1357789fffeb9bb970522_new-svg-logo1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b1359389fffeb9bb972362_new-svg-logo2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b135b627d59bf7ca4bbfba_new-svg-logo3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b135d0a66be20bb6762f57_new-svg-logo4.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b135e589fffeb9bb97760f_new-svg-logo5.svg)

UNIFIED PLATFORM
## Experience the simplicity of building live experiences
From one-to-one interactions to unlimited scalability in a single SDK. No need to set up, babysit, and burn dollars with multiple SDKs.
# [Real-time video callsIntegrate instant 1-1/1-many video interaction between your users.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b627d745c2ac6152ae1c01_videosvg.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b6281204cc73cdb9c37e0a_video-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73db2f25d4eca82eeb79b_Video.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b531d12062d4657deb8685_Video.webp)](https://dyte.io/</video-sdk>)# [Clear audio conferencingEmbed high-quality, jitter free, and uninterrupted real-time audio calling.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b6287ca408e32aac7250b6_audiosvg.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b62896a46e3c0301cbafab_audio-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73d96f25d4eca82ee93b8_Voice.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b53228097020ec3bcad24c_Audio.webp)](https://dyte.io/</voice-sdk>)# [Interactive live streamingNEWAdd large-scale, near real-time live broadcast to captivate your audiences.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b628b25f62aa79d0405348_livesvg.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b628c804cc73cdb9c48fb5_live-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73e11d7a97121a4a2e923_Live.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b53288afd549954f7612b7_Live.webp)](https://dyte.io/</live-streaming-sdk>)# [AI-powered chatCOMING SOONIntegrate dynamic and interactive text-based direct and group conversations.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b628e045c2ac6152af82d1_chatsvg.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b628f7ab9f91725b54201e_chat-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73dfff94ee221e099a0c1_Chat.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b532b5e3e15270590d6501_Chat.png)](https://dyte.io/</chat-sdk>)
WHY DYTE
## One and only for you
Dyte SDK offers out-of-the-box support for interactive elements like chat, polls, screen share, and plugins across pc, mobile, tablet and the web.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b11864635cb0e2d0e23473_new-svg-13.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddc0b0d41b22285a693f00_cs-ellipse.svg)
Battle-tested infrastructure
Our SDK is designed to blend into your current project, working harmoniously across desktop, mobile and web platforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbc5989aeb93f160948ac_bti-img.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddc229cb3a95f6e06f8e00_bti-ellipse.svg)
Easy integration
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbd30e4c1cd47c0bbfcec_ei-img.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddc2c712def5051b507a22_ei-ellipse.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbdf553f74181457f3cbc_cs-img1.svg)
Complete customization
Dyte SDK offers the highest level of customization that makes your vision a reality. Dyte will get the job done.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbe08320e53e4e2de6316_cs-img2.svg)
Reliability
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbea253f7418145806235_real-img.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddc36012def5051b518f44_real-ellipse.svg)
24/7 support
We offer 24*7 support as roadblocks don't stick to business hours. Our dedicated Slack channel and CSM are ready to assist always.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbed29a064f70347cac44_support-img.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddc3b9e4c1cd47c0c4e989_support-ellipse.svg)
[Start customizing](https://dyte.io/<https:/dev.dyte.io/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddbf6dcb3a95f6e06babf3_Ellipse.svg)
Empowering Developers
## Any platform, any device; all it takes is minutes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64ddc6628c75728dbce9eb74_platform-img.webp)
Docs
Learn from our quick start guides, tutorials, how-to articles, and API reference explorer.
[View docs](https://dyte.io/<https:/docs.dyte.io>)
Sample projects
Start with one of the open-source sample projects on GitHub to accelerate building your application.
[Explore sample apps](https://dyte.io/</showcase>)
Support
Join our vibrant community or reach out to our dedicated support team for prompt assistance.
[Join the community](https://dyte.io/<#>)

SAFE
# Secure, reliable, and scalable
We abstract the complexity of building live experiences while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dyte is SOC-2 and HIPAA compliant.
[Learn more](https://dyte.io/</features/security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/65e9571e6fc3669ecfff9459_soc.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/65e9571e102e6dee2ffa9136_hippa.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/65e9571ea872e0b8c704548d_gdpr.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b5017af1c6c97c1680a0b4_new-svg-Shield.svg)
Using Dyte has reduced our development timeline and increased the pace of our go-to-market by almost 6 months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b16273f3b0772af5764d9b_new-client-dp.webp)
Sujit Karpe
Co-founder & CTO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e69e2f6b97e6efd7dd5416_imocha-logo.svg)
Dyte's unwavering commitment to solving every problem and prioritizing our needs is impressive. Their tech capability, user sensitivity, and future thinking shine through. Remarkable support!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b61e80143ff23d6896fe4f_cust-dipti.jpeg)
Dipti Tandon
Co-Founder
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e69e63607b05d852da22c4_cm-logo.webp)
From handling 500 students to effortlessly managing 5x the traffic, Dyte has truly had our back. The team and founders provided exceptional support whenever we felt stuck.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b61df4ad558e5a92648a49_cust_devansh.jpeg)
Devansh Mishra
Product Manager
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e69e4a0e2ebe3c0e2c7906_ns-logo.svg)
I’m impressed with Dyte's reliability and exceptional support. With easy documentation and hands on support during integration, it was a breeze integrating the product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b61eb29dad7b80616e7d01_cust_anil.jpeg)
Anil Meena
Co-Founder, Head of Product
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e69e8661ede82b69b0deab_pensil-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e69e2f6b97e6efd7dd5416_imocha-logo.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e69e8661ede82b69b0deab_pensil-logo.svg)

UNIFIED PLATFORM
## Experience the simplicity of building live experiences
From one-to-one interactions to unlimited scalability in a single SDK. No need to set up, babysit, and burn dollars with multiple SDKs.
# Real-time video callsIntegrate instant 1-1/1-many video interaction between your users.![⟨31⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b6281204cc73cdb9c37e0a_video-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73db2f25d4eca82eeb79b_Video.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b531d12062d4657deb8685_Video.webp)](https://dyte.io/</video-sdk>)# Clear audio conferencingEmbed high-quality, jitter free, and uninterrupted real-time audio calling.![⟨32⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b62896a46e3c0301cbafab_audio-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73d96f25d4eca82ee93b8_Voice.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b53228097020ec3bcad24c_Audio.webp)](https://dyte.io/</voice-sdk>)# Interactive live streamingNEWAdd large-scale, near real-time live broadcast to captivate your audiences.![⟨33⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b628c804cc73cdb9c48fb5_live-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73e11d7a97121a4a2e923_Live.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b53288afd549954f7612b7_Live.webp)](https://dyte.io/</live-streaming-sdk>)# AI-powered chatCOMING SOONIntegrate dynamic and interactive text-based direct and group conversations.![⟨34⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b628f7ab9f91725b54201e_chat-grad.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64e73dfff94ee221e099a0c1_Chat.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ca2acc6352c221abe583d0/64b532b5e3e15270590d6501_Chat.png)](https://dyte.io/</chat-sdk>)
WHY DYTE
## One and only for you
Dyte SDK offers out-of-the-box support for interactive elements like chat, polls, screen share, and plugins across pc, mobile, tablet and the web.

Battle-tested infrastructure
Our SDK is designed to blend into your current project, working harmoniously across desktop, mobile and web platforms.

generated_description:
### Dyte: Revolutionizing Real-time Communication

**Overview:**
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Dyte is a Bengaluru-based company that's already making waves in the telecommunications sector with its real-time audio and video SDKs. It aims to simplify the integration of live video calls, allowing developers to embed high-quality video communication in their applications with just a few lines of code—less than 10, to be precise! 

**What They Do:**
Dyte's offerings center around three main products:
1. **Live Video SDK**: Integrate real-time video experiences into applications.
2. **Voice Conferencing SDK**: Incorporate high-fidelity voice chat seamlessly.
3. **Live Streaming SDK**: Deliver scalable live streaming solutions.

These SDKs are designed for various industries including **Ed-tech**, **Telehealth**, **HR Tech**, **Fitness**, **Gaming**, **Events**, and even **Dating**. You can find practical examples of their use through a showcase on their website.

**Team & Culture:**
With a dedicated team of 45 employees, Dyte prides itself on being developer-friendly, blending cutting-edge technology with robust support. They are focused on providing a unified platform that reduces complexity, allowing businesses to deliver engaging live experiences without the hassle of juggling multiple SDKs.

**Security & Compliance:**
Dyte takes safety seriously, being SOC-2 and GDPR compliant. This ensures that applications built using their technology are not just effective, but also secure, enabling users to communicate with peace of mind.

**Getting Started:**
For those looking to dive in, Dyte offers **10,000 free minutes** over three months of their SDK services, allowing developers to prototype and integrate functionalities without immediate costs. The company encourages experimentation, ensuring that support is just a step away—available 24/7 via their dedicated channels.

**Why Choose Dyte?**
Dyte stands out for its ability to deliver high-quality, low-latency communication solutions that are easy to implement. The architecture is designed to handle everything from one-on-one interactions to large-scale conferencing, all while keeping the focus on customization. This flexibility allows businesses to create unique applications tailored to their specific needs.

For a closer look and to start building, check out [Dyte's website](https://dyte.io) and explore their offerings. In a world where real-time communication is crucial, Dyte is paving the way for effortless integration and exceptional user experiences. 

So, jump in, the water's fine!
